mean_cn: n. 罗嗦，冗长，措辞方式
mean_en: speech or writing that contains too many words or that uses words that are more difficult than necessary
word_etyma: verbi=verb词+age年龄→上了年纪的人喜欢唠叨→冗词，废话
short_phrase: too much verbiage on the page
sentence: The page had so much verbiage on it that I couldn't understand it.
sentence_trans: 这一页上有太多赘语，我看不懂。
